Parameters: NumberPicker: The view whose scroll state is being reported.

int: The current scroll state. One of @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_IDLE_E@, @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_TOUCH_SCROLL_E@ or @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_IDLE_E@. Value is @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_IDLE_E@, @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_TOUCH_SCROLL_E@, or @B_android#widget#NumberPicker#OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_FLING_E@
onScrollStateChange(android.widget.Numbe.Description: Callback invoked while the number picker scroll state has changed.
onScrollStateChange(android.widget.Numbe.FullName: public abstract void onScrollStateChange (NumberPicker view, int scrollState)

ClassDesc: Interface to listen for the picker scroll state.
